title: Trump says estimated White House ballroom cost doubled to $400 million
shortDescription: Trump said the projected cost of his White House ballroom has risen to $400 million, double the initial estimate in July of $200 million.

title: 'Doesn't get worse': Trump slams Brown after shooting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump took to Truth Social to criticize the number of security cameras at Brown University.

title: Trump expands US travel ban list
shortDescription: President Donald Trump extended the U.S. travel ban to 39 countries citing security and foreign policy concerns.

title: Watch livestream: Trump set to address the nation from White House
shortDescription: President Trump is set to deliver a live address from the White House on the evening of Wednesday, Dec. 17.

title: Mamdani's NYC win has Staten Island Republicans talking secession
shortDescription: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani isn't even in office yet, but many Staten Island lawmakers are concerned and thinking about seceding from NYC

title: Trump praises 'enduring resilience' of Jewish people at Hanukkah event
shortDescription: The president hosted Jewish American supporters at a White House event where he touted his support for Israel and lamented recent antisemitic attacks.

title: Trump labels Venezuela terror group and blocks oil
shortDescription: President Donald Trump designated Venezuela a foreign terrorist organization and blocked sanctioned oil tankers from entering or leaving the country.

title: Trump orders blockade of sanctioned Venezuelan oil tankers
shortDescription: Along with the blockade, Trump said he has formally designated Venezuela's Maduro and his government allies a foreign terrorist organization.

title: Trump moves to dismantle major US climate research hub in Colorado
shortDescription: The Trump administration is breaking up the National Center for Atmospheric Research, taking aim at one of the world's leading climate research labs.

title: Donald Trump Jr., Bettina Anderson announce engagement at White House
shortDescription: President Donald Trump joined his son Donald Trump Jr. and now fiancee Bettina Anderson at a White House Christmas reception as they announced their engagement.

title: Judge says he is unlikely to halt Trump's White House ballroom
shortDescription: The federal judge said at a hearing he was unlikely to issue the temporary restraining order sought by the National Trust for Historic Preservation

title: Trump defends Susie Wiles, agrees he has an 'alcoholic's personality'
shortDescription: President Trump said he stands by White House chief of staff Susie Wiles after she made wide-ranging comments about his administration in Vanity Fair.

title: Trump administration should pause nuke-building plan, lawmakers say
shortDescription: The two lawmakers questioned the necessity of the nuclear weapons agency's plutonium pit strategy in a letter exclusively shared with USA TODAY.

title: What is 'Trump derangement syndrome?' Behind Trump's Rob Reiner post
shortDescription: Donald Trump's social post a day after Rob Reiner's death drew bipartisan criticism. POTUS said the actor had Trump derangement syndrome. What is that?

title: Trump officials respond to Susie Wiles interview
shortDescription: Trump officials, from JD Vance to Karoline Leavitt, responded to Susie Wiles' Vanity Fair interview.

title: Trump to deliver primetime address to the nation on Wednesday
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he will address the nation on Wednesday, Dec. 17 in primetime remarks from the White House.

title: VP Vance urges patience on affordability ahead of 2026 midterms
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance said the Trump administration is "making progress" to bring prices down for the American people.

title: Susie Wiles says Trump has 'alcoholic's personality' in media interview
shortDescription: Trump's chief of staff and one of his closest aides offered candid remarks in Vanity Fair but now calls it a "hit piece."

title: Donald Trump Jr. is engaged to Bettina Anderson. See them together
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's eldest son is engaged. See Donald Trump Jr. and Florida socialite Bettina Anderson together.

title: Here's everything President Trump said about Rob Reiner
shortDescription: President Donald Trump received bipartisan condemnation after delivering sharp criticism of Rob Reiner after his death.

title: Trump's $300 million White House ballroom makeover faces day in court
shortDescription: A US judge on Tuesday is holding a hearing on a lawsuit accusing the Trump administration of launching the ballroom project without legal approval.

title: Trump faces criticism over Reiner comments
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is facing criticism from both sides of the aisle over his Rob Reiner comments.
